Pre-Game Insights: India bowling coach Morne Morkel is reportedly dissatisfied with Hardik Pandya's effort during net practice, specifically with him bowling too close to the stumps.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Emerging talents like Harshit Rana and Mayank Yadav, who impressed with their performances in the IPL, will be eager to carry that momentum into the T20Is.
Others: The India-Bangladesh 3-match T20I series is scheduled to start from October 6, 2024.
